title: (x) Fanzine 137 customized Futura? - yes {Lex}
content:
Does anyone know if this is an actual font or just a customised Futura?

cheers.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [fanzine9137\_01.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130822095325/http:/typophile.com/files/fanzine9137_01.jpg) | 31.26 KB |
author: cuttin shapes

comments.content:
I think you're right about this being a custom Futura. The only Futura I know of with strange characters is LTC's Twentieth Century, but it's only got lower-case alternates.

- Lex

Well there is also the excellent Architype Renner:

[http://www.foundrytypes.co.uk/foundry\_architype\_1/renner.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20130822095325/http:/www.foundrytypes.co.uk/foundry_architype_1/renner.html "http://www.foundrytypes.co.uk/foundry\_architype\_1/renner.html")

Mikey :-)
